Uses of Class
org.restlet.service.MetadataService

Packages that use MetadataService
org.restlet Core classes of the API. 
org.restlet.data Information exchanged by components. 
org.restlet.resource Client and server resource classes. 
 

Uses of MetadataService in org.restlet
 

Methods in org.restlet that return MetadataService
 MetadataService Application.getMetadataService()
          Returns the metadata service.
 

Methods in org.restlet with parameters of type MetadataService
 void Application.setMetadataService(MetadataService metadataService)
          Sets the metadata service.
 

Uses of MetadataService in org.restlet.data
 

Methods in org.restlet.data with parameters of type MetadataService
 Variant ClientInfo.getPreferredVariant(List<? extends Variant> variants, MetadataService metadataService)
          Returns the best variant for a given resource according the the client preferences: accepted languages, accepted character sets, accepted media types and accepted encodings.
 Variant ClientInfo.getPreferredVariant(Resource resource, MetadataService metadataService)
          Deprecated. Used ClientInfo.getPreferredVariant(List, org.restlet.service.MetadataService) instead.
 

Uses of MetadataService in org.restlet.resource
 

Methods in org.restlet.resource that return MetadataService
 MetadataService UniformResource.getMetadataService()
          Returns the application's metadata service or create a new one.
